title: Percent, Ratio, and Money Assessment
description: Assessment including image-based percent, ratio, and money problems

questions.question: Based on the image `ratio-apples-oranges.png`, which statement is correct?
options: There are more oranges than apples
There are more apples than oranges
questions.explanation: The image shows 3 apples and 2 oranges.

questions.question: The ratio shown in `ratio-apples-oranges.png` is ______.
What percent is shown in `percent-hundred-grid.png`?
The image `percent-hundred-grid.png` shows more than half shaded.
questions.explanation: Only 25% is shaded, which is less than half.

questions.question: Using `money-change-example.png`, how much change is given?
Which image best helps explain percent?
questions.explanation: The hundred grid shows parts out of 100.

questions.question: The image `discount-shopping-tag.png` shows a 20% discount.
If an item costs $200, how much is the discount shown in `discount-shopping-tag.png`?
After applying the discount in `discount-shopping-tag.png` to a $100 item, the new price is ______.
How does the image `money-change-example.png` help explain subtraction?
questions.correctAnswer: It shows money given minus cost equals change.
questions.explanation: Change is found by subtracting the cost from the amount paid.

questions.question: Which image best represents a real-life money situation?
questions.explanation: It shows a customer paying and receiving change.

questions.question: The image `ratio-apples-oranges.png` can be used to explain fractions.
questions.explanation: Ratios can also be written as fractions.

questions.question: Which fraction matches the shaded part in `percent-hundred-grid.png`?
The discount in `discount-shopping-tag.png` means you pay ______ percent less.
Name one thing you could buy where `discount-shopping-tag.png` would be useful.
questions.explanation: Percent discounts are common when shopping.

questions.question: If the apples in `ratio-apples-oranges.png` doubled, how many apples would there be?
The image `money-change-example.png` shows addition.
questions.explanation: It shows subtraction to find change.

questions.question: Which image helps you understand "out of 100"?
The image `percent-hundred-grid.png` shows ______ shaded squares.
Explain how images help you understand math better.
questions.correctAnswer: Images show ideas clearly and make problems easier to understand.
questions.explanation: Visuals help connect math to real life.
